ygData.subject: Server side caching (reverse proxy) and https
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi folks, one of the big benefits of REST is the caching ability. Is it possible to use a reverse proxy cache AND https? This might be very useful in

Hi folks,

one of the big benefits of REST is the caching ability. Is it po=
ssible to use a reverse proxy cache AND https? This might be very useful in=
 enterprise scenarios, but i dont have any experience with squid & co...

O=
r are there any other recommendations to secure the resource exchange?

Reg=
ards,
Jakob
